@buner
Before you ask stupid questions, check to see if it's already been explicitly answered.

It works!

1 - Unpack the *.sid/*.sis files and the crack folder from the .iso file (forget about the rest, I think this is more a joke from "The Sceners" then a real thing)..

2 - Download the Phoenix SID Extractor: r.a.p.i.d.s.h.a.r.e.c.o.m/files/311915144/Phoenix_SID_Extractor.rar
(remove dots..)

3 - Place the program inside a foldes and run it. It will create files in that folder.. When it's done, run it and update it! ( Help > Phoenix Update Centre )

4 - Install the DirectX and the vcredist_sp1_x86.exe. They are inside "Redist" folder, in the folder where you placed the Phoenix.exe

5 - Run the program and go to Instruments > Sid Unpacker

6 - Click: Scan a SIM-file (select the sid file you extracted from the ISO) > Select all > Unpack. Now you need to select a folder where the game will be extracted...

7 - Now go to that folder and copy all crack contenct inside the BIN folder...

8 - Open your torrent client and make sure you are seeding

8 - Now run "SamHD.exe" and have fun!

Special thx to millz87 for bringing it to us
